summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3434 for the improvement of East 75th Street, from 12th Avenue Northeast to 15th Avenue Northeast, certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42610, and levying and and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
